div.p: Gel images showing discrimination between ( a) Culex torrentium/ Culex pipiens [M = ϕX174 marker, 1 = negative control, 2 = Cx. pipiens, 3 = Cx. torrentium] and ( b) Cx. pipiens form pipiens, Cx. pipiens form molestus and hybrid forms [M = ϕX174 marker, 1 = negative control, 2 = form pipiens, 3 = form molestus, 4 = pipiens/molestus hybrid].
